    ps_3_0
    def c1, 1, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c3, 4, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999
    def c4, -3, 0.5, 1.5, 65504
    def c5, 1, 2, 3, 15
    def c6, 0.25, 0.0078125, 0.0625, 0
    def c17, 14.9998999, 0.05859375, 0.234375, 0
    def c18, 0.001953125, 0.064453125, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.zw
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13


// Unreal light shaft fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_48916BCD_0.txt
texldl r7, c220.z, s13
mov r6, c11 // TextureSpaceBlurOrigin
mad r6.x, r7.x, c220.w, r6.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    mov r0.zw, c10
    mad r0.xy, v0.zwzw, -r0.zwzw, r6
    dp2add r0.x, r0, r0, c1.y
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, c4.y
    mov r0.yz, c4
    mad r0.y, c9.w, -r0.y, r0.z
    texld_pp r1, v0.zwzw, s2
    mul_pp r0.z, r1.w, r1.w
    mul_pp r1, r1.zzxy, c14.zzxy
    lrp r2.x, r0.z, r0.y, c9.w
    lrp r3.x, r0.x, c1.x, r2.x
    mul r0.x, c12.x, c12.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c12.x
    lrp_pp r2.x, r0.x, c1.x, r3.x
    texld r0, v0.zwzw, s1
    mul r0, r0.zzxy, c0.zzxy
    mul_pp r0, r0, c3.x
    mul r3, c1.xxyy, v1.xyxx
    texldl_pp r3, r3, s0
    max r2.yz, v1.xzww, c8.xxyw
    min r4.xy, c8.zwzw, r2.yzzw
    texld_pp r4, r4, s4
    mad r5, r4.zzxy, -c3.x, r3.zzxy
    add r2.y, r3.w, -c2.y
    mul r3, r4.zzxy, c3.x
    mad_pp r3, r4.w, r5, r3
    dp3_pp r2.z, r3.zwyw, c3.yzww
    mul_pp r2.z, r2.z, c4.x
    exp_pp r2.z, r2.z
    mul_sat_pp r2.w, r2.z, c0.w
    mul_sat_pp r2.z, r2.z, c13.x
    mul r1, r1, r2.z
    mad_pp r0, r0, r2.w, r3
    mul_pp r0, r0, r2.x
    mad_pp r0, r1, c3.x, r0
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r0.zwyw, c7.y, c7.x
    rcp r3.z, r1.x
    rcp r3.w, r1.y
    rcp r3.xy, r1.z
    mul_sat_pp r0, r0, r3
    mul r1.xyw, r0.xwzz, c17.xzzy
    frc r0.x, r1.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r1.x
    mad r0.y, r0.y, c5.w, -r0.x
    mad r1.x, r0.x, c6.z, r1.w
    add r0.x, -r2.y, c1.z
    rcp r0.z, r2.y
    cmp r0.x, r0.x, c1.w, r0.z
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    min_pp r1.z, r0.x, c4.w
    add r2, r1.z, -c16
    cmp_pp r2, r2, c1.y, c1.x
    mov r3.xy, c1
    mad r3, c16.xxyz, -r3.yxxx, r1.z
    mad_sat_pp r0.xzw, r1.z, c15.w, -c15.xyyz
    cmp_pp r2, r3, r2, c1.y
    dp3_pp r1.z, r2.yzww, c5
    dp3_pp r0.x, r2, r0.xzww
    add_pp r0.z, r1.z, c1.x
    mad r2.x, r1.z, c6.x, c6.y
    mad r3.x, r0.z, c6.x, c6.y
    mov r3.yz, c18.xxyw
    add r3, r1.xyxy, r3.yxzx
    texld_pp r4, r3, s3
    texld_pp r3, r3.zwzw, s3
    lrp_pp r5, r0.y, r3, r4
    mov r2.yz, c18.xxyw
    add r1, r1.xyxy, r2.yxzx
    texld_pp r2, r1, s3
    texld_pp r1, r1.zwzw, s3
    lrp_pp r3, r0.y, r1, r2
    add_pp r1, -r3, r5
    mad_pp oC0, r0.x, r1, r3

// approximately 77 instruction slots used (9 texture, 68 arithmetic)
